name: DoctorDouglasSteinbrech
0:
”Alexa, ask Doctor Douglas Steinbrech when I should start taking my antibiotics?”
”Alexa, ask Doctor Douglas Steinbrech How long should I ice?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor douglas steinbrech
des: Ask Doctor Douglas Steinbrech, through Alexa, all of your routine postoperative questions. While this is not a diagnostic skill, it will answer frequently asked questions. This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
